title: The Convenient Wife
description: I need a wife. She's perfect for the job. I'm not the kind of man who thinks about settling down. But when my family demands my inheritance is off limits unless I show them I'm serious about having a future with marriage and kids and all that jazz, I know I have to find a solution. That's where Starla comes in. My new intern is funny, beautiful, and perfect for the role of my 'wife.' What can go wrong? How about... falling head over heels for Starla and realizing that I want our pretend marriage to become real? But to get my happily ever after, I need to tell her about the game I've been playing with her heart behind her back. Will the truth end our future before it begins?  This novel contains a hot billionaire who never meant to fall in love, but now he's hooked. He won't rest until she has his wedding ring on her finger. NO cheating, lots of kindle-melting action, and always a happily ever after!
author: Penny Wylder
